descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]MOD[/u][/b][/color][/center]

File contains meshes from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389//?]Insanitys Celtic Katana[/url]  by InsanitySorrow, edited to be visible as second weapon with the use of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34155//?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url].

It just adds left hand meshes to work properly with Dual Sheath Redux, nothing more, the entire weapons appearance must be credited to his original author, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/258945/]InsanitySorrow[/url]


Consists Of:
4 Katana meshes (blue/black/red/brown)
4 Tanto meshes (blue/black/red/brown)

This is just a meshes mod, if you need to change weapons position as you see in my screenshots you have to use a custom skeleton like [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35927//?]mine[/url]

[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]REQUIREMENTS[/u][/b][/color][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389//?]Insanitys Celtic Katana[/url]  by InsanitySorrow
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34155//?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by Neovalen

[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]INSTALLATION[/u][/b][/color][/center]

- Install InsanitySorrow original mod
- Install my mod by drop it into your skyrim folder
- Install Dual Sheath Redux (if you don\'t have it)
- Go in SkyProc Patcher folder of Dual Sheath Redux mod and Start Dual Sheath Redux Patch.jar to add Celtic katana meshes into it.

[center][color=#0099FF][b][u]CREDITS[/u][/b][/color][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15389//?]Insanitys Celtic Katana[/url] by InsanitySorrow
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34155//?]Dual Sheath Redux[/url] by Neovalen
author: Ayame
